posts.postText:
There is talk that BF3 WILL be on steam just in time, before pc release.

http://www.pr0gaming.com/dice-battlefield-3-rumor-now-on-valve-steam-release-date?utm_source=crowdignite.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=crowdignite.com

If this were to happen, I'd hope it be before Christmas though D:
